sn19.10:4.1: “Just now, Reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man with balls as big as pots flying through the air.
sn19.10:4.2: When he was walking he had to lift his testicles on to his shoulder.
sn19.10:4.3: And when he sat down, he sat right on them.
sn19.10:4.4: Vultures, crows, and hawks kept chasing him, pecking, plucking, and hacking
sn19.10:4.6: “That being used to be a corrupt official right here in Rājagaha. …”
